title: Silver Dips After US Pause on Critical Minerals Import Tariff
description: Silver dipped after ending the earlier session marginally lower, as investors looked past the US decision to refrain from imposing tariffs on critical minerals.
content: Silver dipped after ending the earlier session marginally lower, as investors looked past the US decision to refrain from imposing tariffs on critical minerals.
